title: PSA: if you ban "none" before even asking who if anyone has any ban requests...
body:
then i cannot even repeat on the forums the kind of scum u are.

if no one says anything fine.. but at LEAST 
#ASK

replies.body:
It's my ban. Not yours.

It still baffles me how many people are still demanding 'ban this, ban that' like we didn't all get our own ban. 

Use yours. Not mine.
